title: Ruling on changing the intention of a prayer after starting it, intended to pray Maghrib as 4 rakats
transcript: zubair from india says he intended to pray maghrib for raka's nobody in his sound mind would do this super so most likely you were absent-minded and you started praying maghrib without really intending to pray it for raqqa because nobody does this unless you're a recently revert don't know the difference between maghrib and fajr so then during the first two raka's he realized that maghrib is three raka's so his change his intention your prayer is valid and no problem in that you
